title: Are there songs similar to 'I took a pill in Ibiza'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Personally, I would recommened “Laung Gawacha” by Nucleya!! Its sort of similar according to me! Both are quite good bass songs.. Faded by Alan Walker, Just give me a reason by p!nk, 24k magic by Bruno mars are also little bit similar! Actually there are a lot and lot of songs, with great edm, great trap- songs by the Chainsmokers, Avicii, twenty one pilots, weeknd and more.
